title: Center for Sports Media Connects Point Park Students with Leading Sports Executives (Point Park University) ...
text: ( Source : Point Park University ) Monday, October 19 , 2015 Pictured is M.B.A . alumna Krystin Roczko, U.S. field marketing manager for Reebok-CCM. The Pittsburgh Center for Sports Media and Marketing kicked off the fall 2015 semester with an
